content.question: The conditions referred to in the report were most directly a result of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The transformation of the Habsburg Empire into the dual monarchy of Austria-Hungary
The emergence of new Balkan states as the Ottoman Empire declined
The growth of international tensions following Bismarckâ€™s dismissal as chancellor of Germany
The increase of economic competition between imperial powers for industrial resources

content.answer: The emergence of new Balkan states as the Ottoman Empire declined

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
